title: Green Grape Juice
ingredients: 4 cups green grapes, (about 1¼ pounds) preferably seedless
instructions: In a blender, blend the grapes and lemon juice until very smooth, about 1 minute. 	Pour the mixture through a sieve into a bowl, pressing hard on the solids.	Serve the grape juice over ice in a tall glass.
source: The Best of Gourmet 2000, from the Editors of Gourmet, ©1999 by The Condé Nast Publications, Published by Random House Inc., New York.
